This folder contains Wijmo for Angular 2 modules in the System module format.

The wijmo.angular2.js (wijmo.angular2.min.js) file is a "bundle" containing
all Wijmo for Angular 2 named modules. It can be added to your application
by the HTML <include> element.

The rest of .js (min.js) files represent individual Wijmo for Angular 2 modules,
one file per module.
